alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fairfield, north central Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Carolina, or 7 miles south of Springdale, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Carolina, Elgin, Killian, Villages at Sandhill, Longtown, Blythewood, Ridgeway, Smallwood and Cedar Creek Fire Station. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 82 and 85. Interstate 77 between mile markers 21 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
